body.name: Mimoglad Home Office Chair, High Back Desk Chair, Ergonomic Mesh Computer Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support and Thickened Seat Cushion (Modern, Ivory White)
features: [5 YEARS HASSLE REPAIR] One ergonomic chair and 5 years of assistant service are provided by Mimoglad. Every issue can be resolved without excuse.

[Say Goodbye to Reduce Fatigue Associated with Muscle Loading] Mimoglad desk chair is designed to support your shoulders, high back, and lumbar region, contouring to your spine's natural shape and keeping your posture straight. So you won't end up slouching like a couch potato. Plus, it rocks from 90 to 135 degrees, allowing you to recline and rest when needed. Invest in your health and productivity with Mimoglad's Ergonomic Office Chair!

[The Premium Supportive Cushion is Never Flat] Improperly padded chairs can cause all sorts of discomfort. But fear not! Our Premium Supportive Cushion is made with high-resilience foam that conforms to your hips, reducing tailbone pressure. we've thickened the cushion from 3.4" to 4" to provide strong support. Say hello to all-day comfort with Mimoglad's Ergonomic Office Chair!

[Avoid a static sitting position] Claiming to be ergonomic is easy, but having adjustable functions is where the rubber meets the road. Our computer chair is allowing you to customize the height (4' up or down range) for optimal comfort and circulation. The adjustable lumbar support with padding helps combat lower back pain. upgrade to Mimoglad's Ergonomic Office Chair and get your wiggle on!

[High Quality Ensures Longevity] The swivel chair has passed all commercial tests, so you can trust its reliability and durability. with a strong nylon frame and SGS-certified gas lift cylinder that can handle up to 300 pounds. Its sturdy casters provide smooth and quiet rolling on any floor. Upgrade to Mimoglad's chair for long-lasting quality.

[Don't Sweat It out This Summer] The mesh office chair is covered in a breathable fabric material instead of stuffy leather, so your body can keeps cool - even on the hottest days. Let your body breathe free! Your bum will thank you.

[Office Aesthetics] We believe that working in a trendy vibe promotes well-being, productivity, and fulfillment. Mimoglad collection has an elegant yet comfortable quality where impeccably youth sense is perfectly at home with classic chic sense. Try this accent computer chair to add mod appeal to your writing desk or parlor seating ensemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a new work chair for quite some time. I didn't want to break the bank, but I also didn't want to go too cheap. This chair is a great price for the quality! The seat cushion is nicely padded, and at 5'3 I can sit cross-legged comfortably in this chair. I also love that the arm rests can go up or down. This chair was very easy to assemble, my 8 year old was able to help me. I definitely recommend this chair if you are looking for something nice but don't want to spend hundreds of dollars. Plus the colors are SO CUTE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfortable Chair at Great Price!!
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this chair and with the customer service! The chair is a beautiful mustard color that they call Jasmine which really enhances my decor. It is lightweight yet has very sturdy construction. It was easier to assemble than almost any piece of furniture I've ever bought. And the assembly instructions are very good. It's also a lot of fun to just sit in the chair and spin around in a circle. Haha. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Quality, assembly is a two person job
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair during the Black Friday sale. Given the reasonable price, I was concerned that this chair would be a cheap pile of plastic. In reality, it's shockingly well made. Let's start from the ground up. The legs are made of metal and not plastic. The casters are the best I've had on any chair. They roll smoothly and well. The seat is padded enough to be supportive. The back is substantial with very good lumbar support. The arms fold up so I can shove the chair under my computer desk so it it's in the way. I love this feature! The chair is truly ergonomic. The site tips you forward just slightly. The lumbar back support is in the right place and my elbows rest on the arms while I'm typing. The height of the chair is easily adjustable with a range of nearly 5 inches. That's more than I've seen in other chairs.Now let's talk about assembly. The chair came well packed and there were good assembly directions. They provided a long Allen wrench with a long handle. There were extras of every screw and washer. They included white gloves. I thought that was cool but unnecessary. Most of the screw holes aligned well. But I found installation to be a bit frustrating. Don't worry, there's an easy fix. The chair's arms were connected to what they call a "bracket". Each arm needed to be attached to the back of the chair first and then to the seat. It was difficult to hold things together at the right angle to insert the screws and washers. The workaround is simple.. recruit two more arms - a spouse, neighbor, kid, etc. They can hold things in the right place while you align, insert, and tighten the screws. The chair only goes together one way so it isn't likely that you'd need to hire a handyman to do it for you.It took me a few hours to put the chair together (including time to look up new curse words on the Urban Dictionary website). The manufacturer provides you with an assembly video but requires that you register the product first. Sure, let's give lots of private information to a company I hadn't heard of before to register a product I didn't now if I was going to keep. ;) In the end, I was pleased that I was able to get the chair all screwed up (Ok, assembled). This morning I showed it off to the students who were in my 3 Zoom fitness Classes. They were all really impressed with it. If you buy yourself one, I think you'll like it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars slow shipping but great chair
reviews.reviewText: This is the SECOND chair I have ordered from this company. The 1st was the orange model with the head rest for my husbands office chair. He loved his so I ordered this pink one without the headrest for my home craft room. I spend 10+ hours at times hunched over a sewing projects. Improper back support was really becoming an issue. The lumbar support that this chair has, with the ability to adjust to my trunk length is a huge advantage for support and comfort. The padded seat and width of the seat is more then adequate. I am a smaller US size 2, and the seat width is massive for my build. The seat width can comfortably accommodate someone with a much larger derriere.Shipping was over 2 weeks to receive the chair so order with expectation of a month to get it. Other then this, the chair was quite easy to assemble. The chair itself is sturdy and quite comfortable. Color was accurate with the pictures depicted. The cost was far bellow retail in big box stores for far less quality of a chair with less choice in color selection. I recommend this chair for comfort, value, and color selection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable well made chair
reviews.reviewText: I spent quite a bit of time searching for a new office chair - finally decided on this one and am very pleased. The parts are well made, it was easy to put together, everything works as expected, the color is exactly as pictured and it is very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Comfortable looking Chair- Easy To Assemble. Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I have been using another office chair from Mimoglad for about 10 month and what a difference my back feels, now I was looking for another chair for my daughter who sits long hours at her desk I purchased this chair as I had a good experience last time.The customer support provided by the company is outstanding. I did run into an issue with one of the parts and contacted support and it was immediately replaced with another chair and once again they did not disappoint.First and foremost, the assembly process was a breeze. With clear instructions and intuitive design, I had the chair up and ready in 30 minutes.What truly sets this office chair apart is its outstanding comfort. From the moment I sat down, I could feel the ergonomic design perfectly contouring to my body, providing excellent support for my back, neck, and arms. The cushioning is plush and provides just the right amount of firmness, making those long hours at the desk a breeze.The modern aesthetic of the chair is another standout feature. Its sleek and contemporary design looks great in my daughter's room.Speaking of ergonomics, It offers a wide range of customizable features to ensure the perfect fit for every individual. The adjustable height, lumbar support, and armrests allow you to tailor the chair to your specific needs, promoting healthy posture and reducing the risk of.So far my daughters has been using it for a few weeks and loves it.I have not been able to find another office chair with this price point and comfort - quick to assemble, great customer support, incredible comfort, modern design, superb ergonomics.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fácil de armar y súper cómoda
reviews.reviewText: Es muy sencilla de armar, viene con sus instrucciones y trae todos los tornillos perfectamente identificados y separados unos de otros. Se ve sólida porque al terminarla de armar se siente pesada y el respaldo le da un buen apoyo a la espalda. Vienen una gran variedad de colores y además se ve muy elegante. Los reposabrazos también son muy cómodos y el mecanismo de las rueditas es muy fluido, no se atoran ni se traban. La verdad vale la pena por su precio, falta ver la durabilidad pero si tengo algún problema editaré mi comentario.

The media could not be loaded. La silla está muy bonita, muy buenos materiales, muy fácil de armar, viene muy bien empacada y es muy cómoda, el pedido llegó dos días antes de lo previsto, trae un forro protector para el asiento, la verdad me encantó.
Es un producto facil de armar y muy comodo. Me dejo de doler la espalda y tiene un color muy bonito. El precio es bastante razonable. Costo beneficio increíble.

Una muy buena silla, es estética moderna y alta, (característica luego dificil de encontrar en una silla de rueditas), yo la pedí en blanco y se ve super bien, aunque se ve que se ensuciará con facilidad por el color, las patas son de metal y se ven resistentes, soy un Hombre alto y pesado, y siento la silla firme y cómoda en todo momento, me gusta la altura que puede subir el asiento, (aproximadamente 5 cm mas alto que otras sillas), el único pero que le pongo es que el brazo no es ajustable en altura, ya que soy un hombre alto me queda ligeramente bajo el descansa brazos, ( pero me pasa en el auto y en casi todas partes que hay descansa brazos, algunas sillas pueden ajustar la altura de esté, sería lo único que le falta para que sea perfecta, el soporte Lumbar se me hace muy cómodo y si te ayuda a ponerte en un posición mas erguida. después de comprarla y usarla 3 dias ya compré una segunda, y posiblemente compre una 3era para que haga juego con todas las sillas de rueditas de la casa.

reviews.reviewerName: Ana Cristina de la Hoz Madrid
reviews.reviewTitle: Buena compra, mi espalda la agradece
reviews.reviewText: Relativamente fácil de armar. Trae todo lo necesario para hacerlo. No necesitas nada mas.La silla mantiene mi espalda derecha cómodamente.El respaldo no se hace hacia atrás, pero el asiento tiene un ligero balanceo confortable.
